person.persName: Charles M. Thruston (Jefferson County, Kentucky, court clerk and ageny)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, court clerk and agent. Kentucky native. Son of Charles M. Thruston. Married to Leonora Keller Thruston in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 6, 1862. County court clerk in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Jefferson County in 1850. County court clerk in Jefferson County in 1858. County court clerk in Jefferson County in 1861. Agent in Jefferson County in 1863.
